definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: form, fashion;—cstr. [[חוּרַת]] Ez Eze 43:11 v. foreg.; sf. [[חוּרַתוֹ]] v:Eze 43:11 (LXX [[מִחְוֹתָיו]], so Co, or [[תּוֹרׂתָיו]], so Berthol Krae; Toy as MT); so also Kt v:Eze 43:11, v:Eze 43:11 (Qr pl. sf. [[חוּרׂתָיו]]) 2nd of these del. as dittogr. all moderns; 1st rd. as Kt Co Berthol, as Qr Toy; sg. sf. [[חוּרָם]] (Ges: § 91 e Kö:ii.1, 440) Ps 49:15 Qr (Kt [[חירם]]) their form (of the dead).
